snippet.title: PC Longplay [162] FX Fighter
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Eino

I don't like gameplay much, controls feel unresponsive and specific moves are difficult to execute. Lost the last match and had to use one continue. I didn't remove the failed try, because there were few moves not seen in the rematch.

Framerate slows down quite a bit during final match. With faster settings rest of the game would be too fast so this is the best I could do.
Skip to gameplay (2:35) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
